forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some early morning breaks in the overcast, otherwise cloudy. High 18C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 64F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 19C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 66F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 47F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
